A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a film absolutely deserving of being at least nominated for Best Picture. Not just for what it is\, but also for what it represents and successfully accomplishes. The Force Awakens was a great Star Wars movie. I think The Last Jedi crosses the threshold into being a great MOVIE. A fine piece of cinema\, complete with messages and themes and subtexts\, executed with precision\, in a way that uplifts\, inspires\, and promotes thoughtfulness. The side plot is pointless \"setup for later films\" BS\, but other than that. It's great.
